attributes.action: RADICALLY OPT FOR A BILL TO GET RID OF EXPENSE CLAIMS IN ANY SHAPE OR FORM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time to get rid of this out of date system of claiming for expenses and to go for a basic salary like any real job.  It si time for MPs to understand this is a priviledge to serve their constituents not an opportunity to become a part time politician seeking more opportunities to improve their selfish obscene greedy EGO.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
